name: Newt
description: Newt is an experimental web service providing data routing and a multistage pipeline. The pipeline can contain services that work with JSON data. Example object storage, form data validation, JSON transformation, even static file services. Newt can route data from a request to a JSON data source (e.g. Postgres+PostgREST or Solr) and then run those results through a pipeline that may include Newt's Mustache template engine.
releaseNotes: This release added multiple stage pipeline, introduce a mustache template engine and unified generator for Postgres SQL dialect, HTML and mustache templates.
softwareRequirements: A front end web server supporting reverse proxy (e.g. Apache2, NginX)
